body_html:
@wt-huang,
Sorry for the late reply. I don't use a Windows machine as my daily driver which makes testing this on the Windows machine in our office time-consuming. (That's why I changed to the virtual machine)

The problem still persists with TensorFlow 1.11.0 on a natively installed Windows (I get the same error as attached in my original post).

I think me trying the same thing over and over again doesn't help. Can you provide details about the setup you used when it worked for you? Did you use the script as I provided it or did you modify it slightly? How did you install TensorFlow? Which Windows version did you use?

It seems like I don't have the permissions to reopen the issue. Can you reopen it for me?

Thank you!

body:
@wt-huang,
Sorry for the late reply. I don't use a Windows machine as my daily driver which makes testing this on the Windows machine in our office time-consuming. (That's why I changed to the virtual machine)

The problem still persists with TensorFlow 1.11.0 on a natively installed Windows (I get the same error as attached in my original post).

I think me trying the same thing over and over again doesn't help. Can you provide details about the setup you used when it worked for you? Did you use the script as I provided it or did you modify it slightly? How did you install TensorFlow? Which Windows version did you use?

It seems like I don't have the permissions to reopen the issue. Can you reopen it for me?

Thank you!
